kpi_info.title: RB RELEASE BY DYN LINK OPT DUE TO RL POWER CONGESTION
kpi_info.use: The number of released radio bearers by the dynamic link optimisation for NRT traffic due to RL power congestion. UPDATED:When the radio bearer is successfully released.
